White_Plains.The Westchester:
This article is about the mall in White Plains, NY. For the shopping center in Mohegan Lake, NY, formerly known as the Westchester Mall, see Cortlandt Town Center.
The Westchester is a 890,000-square-foot (83,000 m2), shopping mall in downtown White Plains, New York. It is operated by Simon Property Group, which owns 40% of the mall, and is home to some of today's most fashionable and well-known retailers, many with their only location in affluent Westchester County, New York.
